## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description | Type      | Default                     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ----------- | --------- | --------------------------- |
| `itemChecked` | `item-checked` |             | `boolean` | `false`                     |
| `itemId`      | `item-id`      |             | `string`  | `'defaultID' + offerId()()` |
| `itemText`    | `item-text`    |             | `string`  | `'content'`                 |
| `radioColor`  | `radio-color`  |             | `string`  | `'blue'`                    |
| `radioName`   | `radio-name`   |             | `string`  | `'defaultName'`             |
| `radioStyle`  | `radio-style`  |             | `string`  | `'round'`                   |
